name: R.B.I. Baseball '95
overview: Early prototype of the cancelled Sega Mega Drive version. The game was originally announced at CES 1995 for the Sega CD as well as the 32x. This version was planned before the announcement and was cancelled for unknown reasons. This build contains references to the 32x, so plans were already underway. Some elements carried over directly from R.B.I. Baseball '94, such as the ROM header and some of the graphics in the main menu.
